Doepner/Faulds--NotesItems 1-134--Clippings ScrapbookPage 9; no title; A question and answer section which states the permanence of thumbprints was shown in 1823 by J. E. Purkinje, whose work was later taken up by 'Bewick', Galton, and Herschel. Handwritten notes underneath on clipping acquisition. Ithaca Journal-News; DF 654
